api_list.name: URL Encoded Verify Smtp Information Endpoint
api_list.description: URL Encoded Verify Smtp Information Endpoint

api_list.name: URL Encoded Send Email Endpoint
api_list.description:
Compose and Transmit Individual Email

Customize your email transmission by incorporating the following SMTP options to utilize your preferred SMTP account:

{
  "host": "your SMTP host",
  "username": "your SMTP username",
  "password": "your SMTP password",
  "port": "your SMTP port",
  "from": "email address",
  "from_name": "sender name",
  "replyto": "email"
}

Please note that the "replyto" parameter is optional and can be omitted from the list if not required.

api_list.name: Json Verify Smtp Information EndPoint
api_list.description: Json Verify Smtp Information End Point
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://free-email-sender1.p.rapidapi.com/verify_smtp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "free-email-sender1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
